comparators

Class Comparators

  • java.lang.Object
    • comparators.Comparators
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.function.BiFunction<jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,java.lang.Double>, jmr.descriptor.Comparator<jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,java.lang.Double>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DifferentPositionComparators, Maximum, Mean, Minimum

    public abstract class Comparators
extends java.lang.Object
implements jmr.descriptor.Comparator<jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,java.lang.Double>
    Class which contains all the common properties and methods to every comparators. These are related to apply the current inner comparator of the label descriptor.

        public static jmr.descriptor.Comparator<jmr.descriptor.label.LabelDescriptor,java.lang.Double> getLabelComparator()

      • setLabelComparator

        public static void setLabelComparator(int index,
                                      int weightComparator,
                                      boolean weightInclusion)
        Sets the inner comparator of the label descriptor depending on the selected options.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the selected inner label comparator.
        weightComparator - the index of the weight label comparator.
        weightInclusion - true if it's only inclusion, false if it's equality.
